name: Sammiches in Space
description:
In a world... Where black holes... eat.... Sammiches! That's right. You are a black hole, and you want the delicious goodness only a sandwich can offer. Do be careful not to swallow any planets, though...

Developers are Kata Bunaga and Akadeax

Art is by Lawrence Watusi

and Audio and Sound Effects is by me, Amythyst Morris.
